page.title: 01OUR AREA,YEADON,LEEDS
page.content: Our area has 3 schools,{Queensway {Primary, Hillton Grange Special and {Springfield Special School}and we have all helped to do the Domesday Project. The block is mainly rural and contains hill farms,moorlands,airport,a lake and Yeadon,a small town on whose out- skirts the 3 schools are.It used to be in the{West Riding of Yorkshire}but now is in{Leeds and West Yorks.}Woolen manufacturing used to be the main industry.Now most of the mills are empty or used for other things and people work in a variety of small industries or in agriculture,business or professions and some are unem- - ployed.Our most famous building is the beautiful{Town Hall over 100 years {old}and a contrast is Queensway School just 13 years old.Yeadon has a colour- ful High Street a big{Morrisons Super- {market,}and an old fish & chip shop.
